subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Marcus Johnson, a junior forward at Connecticut, plans to transfer and has asked for permission to talk to other programs, the university announced. Johnson played in 51 games in his first two seasons with the Huskies and averaged 4.9 points. A small forward from Los Angeles, Johnson reached double figures seven times and led the Huskies in steals in eight games.
